text: I haven't played this game by Monolith as it wasn't released outside of Japan (a translation does exist though!), but I wonder if it feels a bit like a Xenoblade-lite with its open spaces and action RPG elements. It certainly looked interesting. The first trailer I watched back then had this theme playing and it made me really excited. Unfortunately, the singer Eri Kawai died shortly after this game released... she had a beautiful voice.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky Its nothing like Xenoblade. I think the closest comparison is actually Diablo.
